name: MOM
wishText: I could not have made this without you, and you made me who I am today
textInChatBox: Happy mother's day mom I love you
text2: I was just going to send a text
text3: but you mean so much more than that
text4: and you are so hard to buy a gift for, so I thought I would do something
outroText: Okay, now don't bring up marriage or dating for at least a month LOL
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again!
